Question
========

![](vufgb-summarystatistics-005-en-boxplot01.jpg)
  
Answerlist
----------
* I: equal to,  II: is skewed to the left
* I: to the left of,  II: is skewed to the right
* I: equal to,  II: is skewed to the right
* I: to the right of, II: is symmetric
